LanguageData.SettlementModLabel: Bypass terrain cost on friendly settlements
LanguageData.SettlementModTooltip: Settlement is considered friendly if you can visit it. Player-controlled settlements are always friendly.
LanguageData.WinterModLabel: Suppress winter penaly on tiles without snow
LanguageData.WinterModTooltip: Winter penalty will be applied only for tiles with negative temperature.
LanguageData.BiomeModLabel: Biome-added movement time factor. Current value: {0}.
LanguageData.HillnessModLabel: Hillness-added movement time factor. Current value: {0}.
